title: Windows Camera and Calculator get minor updates as Movies & TV snags transparent controls
text:
Windows Camera and Calculator get minor updates as Movies & TV snags transparent controls 
Published By: WPCentral.com - Today 
It looks like Microsoft isn't quite done with app updates in Windows 10 and Windows 10 Mobile today, as the company has pushed out new versi...
